title: COULD JHIN BE LOOSELY BASED OFF ALEX FROM 'A CLOCKWORK ORANGE'
body: Both are psychopathic serial killers who think of themselves as performers or artists! I doubt any design staff thought of this connection during Jhin's creation process but this is a fun little easter egg that I discovered!{{champion:202}}

replies.body:
Hasn't anyone noticed those 3 stripes below his  left eye? Didn't that Alex from a clockwork orange have those too?
